mapper.insert: insert into product_info ( product_id,product_name,product_sub_title,product_price,product_promote_price,product_stock, product_integral, product_reviews_count, product_total_selled, picture_id, product_description, product_status, store_id, category_type ) values (#{productId},#{productName},#{productSubTitle},#{productPrice},#{productPromotePrice},#{productStock}, #{productIntegral}, #{productReviewsCount}, #{productTotalSelled}, #{pictureId}, #{productDescription}, #{productStatus}, #{storeId}, #{categoryType} )
mapper.select: select a.product_id,a.product_name,a.store_id,a.product_sub_title,a.product_description,a.product_price,a.product_total_selled,a.picture_id,a.product_promote_price,a.product_stock,b.picture_id,b.picture_path as productPicturePath,c.category_id,c.category_name,c.category_type from product_info a,picture b ,product_category c where a.picture_id=b.picture_id and a.category_type=#{categoryType} and c.category_type=#{categoryType}

select a.product_id,a.category_type,a.product_name,a.product_sub_title,a.product_price,a.product_promote_price,a.product_integral,a.product_stock,a.product_description,a.store_id,a.picture_id,b.picture_path from product_info a,picture b where a.picture_id=b.picture_id and a.product_id=#{productId};
